m_szDocSumamry: Electric traction retrofit US 7921950 B2 Abstract A drive train includes an internal combustion engine (“ICE”) coupled to a transmission having a power takeoff port. A transfer device couples an electric motor to the transmission via the port. The electric motor is enabled in a certain configuration to selectively power the drive train during at least certain intervals when the ICE is powered off. Images(9)   Claims(18) 1.
